title: Double Focus Poetry
description: Double Focus is a collection of poems by Nasibu Mwanukuzi aka Ras Nas, a poet and musician from Tanzania. The poems range from love to social commentary. All poems are written in English.Some poems like "Sweet Rhythms", "Way Over Yonder" and "River Nile" have been used as lyrics in Ras Nas' music.
author: Nasibu Mwanukuzi
